name: Upwelling pelagic - Nutrient-rich surface water, upwelling regions, eddies - ecosystem component from the WIO Symphony tool
description: Map of upwelling regions calculated using a derivative of the IBI Coastal Upwelling Index, as measured by the presence of intensity of longitudinal temperature minima. Known limitations: Upwelling index depends on longitudinal sea surface temperature anomalies alone.
license: This work is licensed under a  Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License
citation: Queste B, WIO Symphony team,  2022, Upwelling pelagic - ecosystem component from the WIO Symphony tool, https://github.com/WIOSymphony/
